message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth $10,000 to you at a competitive price. I believe this offer presents a great value for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $11,500 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $10,200?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. Considering our previous discussion, I am willing to negotiate further. How about $10,500 for the product?
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice.  To be honest, $10,000 is the highest I can go. If you're willing to meet that, I'm ready to buy.
